data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word بِاللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.
data.sentence: The word وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ comes from the root م ل ك and is associated with the meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.

data.meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.
data.sentence: The word السَّمَاءَ comes from the root س م و and is associated with the meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.

data.meanings: to fall down, collapse, smitten with remorse, grievously repented, regretted, become confounded and perplexed and unable to see his right course.
data.sentence: The word تُسْقِطَ comes from the root س ق ط and is associated with the meanings: to fall down, collapse, smitten with remorse, grievously repented, regretted, become confounded and perplexed and unable to see his right course.

data.meanings: to assert/claim/allege, the conveyor, to convey, to promise, assertion, responsible/answerable/amenable, to make covet or eagerly desire.
data.sentence: The word زَعَمْتَ comes from the root ز ع م and is associated with the meanings: to assert/claim/allege, the conveyor, to convey, to promise, assertion, responsible/answerable/amenable, to make covet or eagerly desire.

data.meanings: fragments, pieces, lumps, to shatter, to make into fragments
data.sentence: The word كِسَفًا comes from the root ك س ف and is associated with the meanings: fragments, pieces, lumps, to shatter, to make into fragments

data.meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake
data.sentence: The word تَأْتِيَ comes from the root ا ت ي and is associated with the meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake

data.meanings: to accept/admit/receive/agree, meet anyone, to face/encounter someone/something, advance/approach, correspond, counteract/compare/requite/compensate, the front part (12:26), accept with approval, show favour.. qablu - before/formerly,. qubulun - the fore-part, face to face, before, plural of qabilum,. qibalun - power, side, part,. qiblah - towards, in the direction of, facing, alongside,. qiblatun - anything before, opposite, the point in the direction of which prayer is performed, the Ka'bah at Makkah, a place of worship,. qabulun - favourable reception, gracious acceptance,. qabilun - tribe, host, plural qabilatun,. qabailun - tribe,. aqbala - to come near, draw near, approach, turn towards, rush upon,. taqabbala - to accept,. mutaqabilun - opposite to, facing one another,. mustaqbilun - proceeding towards, heading towards.
data.sentence: The word قَبِيلًا comes from the root ق ب ل and is associated with the meanings: to accept/admit/receive/agree, meet anyone, to face/encounter someone/something, advance/approach, correspond, counteract/compare/requite/compensate, the front part (12:26), accept with approval, show favour.. qablu - before/formerly,. qubulun - the fore-part, face to face, before, plural of qabilum,. qibalun - power, side, part,. qiblah - towards, in the direction of, facing, alongside,. qiblatun - anything before, opposite, the point in the direction of which prayer is performed, the Ka'bah at Makkah, a place of worship,. qabulun - favourable reception, gracious acceptance,. qabilun - tribe, host, plural qabilatun,. qabailun - tribe,. aqbala - to come near, draw near, approach, turn towards, rush upon,. taqabbala - to accept,. mutaqabilun - opposite to, facing one another,. mustaqbilun - proceeding towards, heading towards.
